clinical_recommendation.guideline: Increased simvastatin acid exposure as compared to normal function; increased risk of myopathy. If simvastatin therapy is warranted, limit dose to <20mg/day or prescribe an alternative statin.

llm_generated_explanation.summary: Patient has intermediate SLCO1B1 function, leading to a moderate risk of statin-induced myopathy.
llm_generated_explanation.biological_mechanism: The heterozygous variant rs4149056 reduces the transport of simvastatin into the liver. This causes the drug to build up in the bloodstream, increasing the risk of muscle toxicity and myopathy.
